mapper.select: INSERT INTO CREW.LESSON(LESSON_SEQ, START_TIME, END_TIME,YOIL, CYCLE, START_DATE, REG_DATE, USER_SEQ) VALUES ( #{lessonSeq}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{yoil}, #{cycle}, #{startDate}, NOW(), #{userSeq} )

SELECT LESSON_SEQ as lessonSeq, START_TIME as startTime, END_TIME as endTime, YOIL as yoil, cycle as cycle, START_DATE as startDate, USER_SEQ as userSeq, (SELECT NAME FROM CREW.MEMBER WHERE USER_SEQ=4 limit 1) as name FROM CREW.LESSON ORDER BY START_DATE, START_TIME ASC
